headline: Ask HN: Recommendations for a web based CMS for Postgres?
description:
Our team has a custom built CMS that is really painful to update. Every time we make the slightest change to the database we have to dig in and debug the thing, it's too distracting. I'm looking for a web based Content Management System solution for everyone on my team, including the non-programming marketing and admin teammates. We need the bare-bones feature set:

1. Each user can login with a username and pass

2. User can see all the tables in the database

3. User can edit each column of each row

4. Basic searching&filtering would be nice

It doesn't need to be pretty, but it's gotta be intuitive. Also I don't want to have to configure anything, just the username and password for postgres and it works.

I've already explored pgAdmin and pgweb but they were both too technical. I'm also kinda new to the corporate world so google isn't showing me ads for these kinds of things yet.

Thoughts?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 关于基于网络的Postgres CMS的建议？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 關於基於網絡的Postgres CMS的建議？
description_zh-Hans:
我们的团队有一个定制的CMS，更新起来真的很痛苦。每当我们对数据库做了最轻微的改变，我们就得钻研和调试这个东西，这太令人分心了。我正在为我的团队中的每个人寻找一个基于网络的内容管理系统解决方案，包括非编程的营销和管理团队成员。我们需要的是最基本的功能设置：

1. 每个用户可以用用户名和密码登录

2.用户可以看到数据库中的所有表格

3.用户可以编辑每一行的每一列

4.基本的搜索和过滤就更好了

它不需要漂亮，但必须是直观的。

我已经探索过pgAdmin和pgweb，但它们都太技术化了。我也是刚进入企业界，所以google还没有给我显示这类东西的广告。

有什么想法？
